job_description:
• Generate application notes and technical documents by retrieving internal artifacts, applying required formatting, and preparing content for external publishing.
• Experience in Computer Science (software engineering, scripting, data processing) or Electrical Engineering (semiconductor devices, test, product).
• Build agent workflows to refactor, update, and extend legacy test software/firmware, including generating unit tests where needed.
• Engineering background with hands‑on coding or scripting experience (Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, or similar).
• Clear communication and collaboration skills across cross‑functional engineering and product teams.
• Background creating reproducible automation with runbooks, quality checks, or basic telemetry.
• Experience working with CI/CD or content‑publishing pipelines.
• Familiarity with semiconductor test software/firmware, device characterization, or technical documentation (app notes, trimming docs, customer deliverables).

• Join our 30,000 everyday heroes.
• A global technology and professional services company that delivers consulting, technology and mission services to every major agency across the U.
• Government, defense and intelligence community.
• Our 30,000 experts extract the power of technology to create immediate value and deliver solutions at the edge of innovation.
• We operate across 30 countries worldwide, offering leading capabilities in digital modernization, AI/ML, Cloud, Cyber and application development.
• Together with our clients, we strive to create a safer, smarter world by harnessing the power of deep expertise and advanced technology.
